name: Admin-console release 10.0
description: Introducing Version 10 of the LoginRadius User Admin Console. This release focuses on new improvements to the team area for your staff and experience improvements.

ADDED.text: Team Section Site Owner: The Team section now shows the site owner so that all Admin Console users know who the main account holder is.
Added Support Role: Created a new 'Support Role' that has access to the following: User Management, User Profiling, Customer Insights, Billing Section
New plain-text email template field: A new textarea for plain-text emails has been added.
Custom OAuth: We added the ability to have custom fields when using the Cutom OAuth feature.
